verses.verse: It happened in the fourth <S%H702><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> Darius <S%H1867><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> in the fourth <S%H702><s%> day of the ninth <S%H8671><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> the month of Chislev. <S%H3691><s%>

The people of <S%H1004><s%> Bethel <S%H410><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> Sharezer <S%H8272><s%> and Regem Melech, <S%H7278><s%> and their men, <S%H582><s%> to entreat <S%H2470><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s favor, <S%H6440><s%>

and to speak <S%H559><s%> to the priests <S%H3548><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> and to the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Should I weep <S%H1058><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> separating <S%H5144><s%> myself, <S%H6213><s%> as I have done these so many years? <S%H8141><s%>"
Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

"Speak <S%H559><s%> to all the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> and to the priests, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H6684><s%> 'When you fasted and mourned <S%H5594><s%> in the fifth <S%H2549><s%> and in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month for these seventy <S%H7657><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> did you at all <S%H6684><s%> fast to me, <S%H6684><s%> really to me?
When you eat, <S%H398><s%> and when you drink, <S%H8354><s%> don't <S%H398><s%> you eat for yourselves, <S%H8354><s%> and drink for yourselves?

Aren't <S%H1697><s%> these the words which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> proclaimed <S%H7121><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> the former <S%H7223><s%> prophets, <S%H5030><s%> when Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> was inhabited <S%H3427><s%> and in prosperity, <S%H7961><s%> and its cities <S%H5892><s%> around her, <S%H5439><s%> and the South <S%H5045><s%> and the lowland <S%H8219><s%> were inhabited? <S%H3427><s%>'"
The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Thus has Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> spoken, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H8199><s%> 'Execute true <S%H571><s%> judgment, <S%H4941><s%> and show <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> and compassion <S%H7356><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his brother. <S%H251><s%>

Don't <S%H6231><s%> oppress the widow, <S%H490><s%> nor the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> the foreigner, <S%H1616><s%> nor the poor; <S%H6041><s%> and let none of you devise <S%H2803><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against <S%H376><s%> his brother <S%H251><s%> in your heart. <S%H3824><s%>'
But they refused <S%H3985><s%> to listen, <S%H7181><s%> and turned <S%H5414><s%> their backs, <S%H3802><s%> and stopped <S%H3513><s%> their ears, <S%H241><s%> that they might not hear. <S%H8085><s%>

Yes, <S%H7760><s%> they made their hearts <S%H3820><s%> as hard as flint, <S%H8068><s%> lest they might hear <S%H8085><s%> the law, <S%H8451><s%> and the words <S%H1697><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> had sent <S%H7971><s%> by his Spirit <S%H7307><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> the former <S%H7223><s%> prophets. <S%H5030><s%> Therefore great <S%H1419><s%> wrath <S%H7110><s%> came from Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

It has come to pass that, <S%H7121><s%> as he called, and they refused to listen, <S%H8085><s%> so they will call, <S%H7121><s%> and I will not listen, <S%H8085><s%>" said <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies; <S%H6635><s%>

"but I will scatter them with a whirlwind <S%H5590><s%> among all the nations <S%H1471><s%> which they have not known. <S%H3045><s%> Thus the land <S%H776><s%> was desolate <S%H8074><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, <S%H5674><s%> so that no man passed through nor returned: <S%H7725><s%> for they made <S%H7760><s%> the pleasant <S%H2532><s%> land <S%H776><s%> desolate. <S%H8047><s%>"
